Allen Iverson sank the first buzzer-beating shot of his nine-year career, a 14-footer in overtime, and scored 15 points to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 106-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Friday night. It's a great feeling to hit a shot with no time on the clock, said Allen Iverson , who sank a halfcourt winner for the US Olympic team against Germany in an exhibition game. Allen Iverson is getting used to dramatic shots. He sent a game into overtime in the final seconds earlier this

they will make their decisions soon. Representative Mike Pence of Indiana said last week that he would not run. Mitt Romney , a former Massachusetts governor, is not expected to announce any plans until the spring. One of the lessons that Mitt Romney learned from the last campaign is that things got started too soon, said Mitt Romney spokesman Eric Fehrnstrom . "He's in no hurry to announce his plans." Taking advantage of a fire raging through the nearby headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party in downtown Cairo, intruders climbed the gates, broke a window and entered the museum in bid to steal the mummies. But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged, said Zahi Hawass , head of the museum's antiquities department. "Only their heads were intact." The fate of the vandals remains unknown. The Egyptian museum, which houses invaluable treasures of antiquity,

backup quarterback to one of the league's most electrifying players once again. On Monday, the mayor of Dallas made it clear that he wasn't involved in the decision to honour Michael Vick .
